content: पिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [पिष्-क्त] {@--1@} Ground, powdered, crushed; <ls>Bv. 1. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Rubbed together, squeezed or clasped (as the hands). {@--3@} Kneaded. --ष्टं {@--1@} Anything ground, a ground substance. {@--2@} Flour, meal; पिष्टं पिनष्टि ‘he grinds flour’; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} does a useless work or a profitless repetition. {@--3@} Lead.
